hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir increases the exposure to tenofovir alafenamide. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   increases   the exposure to   tenofovir alafenamide .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the risk of renal impairment when given with tenofovir disoproxil. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the risk of renal impairment when given with   tenofovir disoproxil .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to tezacaftor. Manufacturer advises adjust dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors, see tezacaftor with ivacaftor and tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tezacaftor .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors, see  tezacaftor with ivacaftor  and  tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to markedly increase the exposure to ticagrelor. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   markedly   increase   the exposure to   ticagrelor .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to tofacitinib. Manufacturer advises adjust tofacitinib dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tofacitinib .  Manufacturer advises adjust  tofacitinib  dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to tolterodine. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tolterodine .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to tolvaptan. Manufacturer advises caution or adjust tolvaptan dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   tolvaptan .  Manufacturer advises caution or adjust  tolvaptan  dose with potent CYP3A4 inhibitors .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to toremifene. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   toremifene .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to trabectedin. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   trabectedin .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to trastuzumab emtansine. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   trastuzumab emtansine .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to moderately increase the exposure to trazodone. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   moderately   increase   the exposure to   trazodone .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises avoid or monitor adverse effects.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer advises avoid or monitor adverse effects .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to ulipristal. Manufacturer advises avoid if used for uterine fibroids.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   ulipristal .  Manufacturer advises avoid if used for uterine fibroids .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to upadacitinib. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   upadacitinib .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vardenafil. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vardenafil .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vemurafenib. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vemurafenib .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to venetoclax. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   venetoclax .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose—consult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to venlafaxine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   venlafaxine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to verapamil. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   verapamil .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vinblastine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vinblastine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vincristine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vincristine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vindesine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vindesine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vinflunine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vinflunine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to vinorelbine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vinorelbine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to affect the exposure to voriconazole and voriconazole potentially affects the exposure to atazanavir. Manufacturer advises monitor efficacy and toxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   affect   the exposure to   voriconazole  and  voriconazole   potentially   affects   the exposure to   atazanavir .  Manufacturer advises monitor efficacy and toxicity .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir boosted with ritonavir increases the concentration of voxilaprevir. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   boosted with ritonavir   increases   the concentration of   voxilaprevir .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to affect the anticoagulant effect of warfarin. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   affect   the anticoagulant effect of   warfarin .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir is predicted to increase the exposure to zopiclone. Manufacturer advises adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   zopiclone .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose .
